attributes.action: change the way of thinking when it comes to granting asylum
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I feel that the way to cut down on the number of foreigners is to ban all ugly people from entering UK for more than 2 weeks. A panel of judges should decide who is allowed to enter, they hold a vote, and if the male/female wins the majority of the vote, they are allowed into the country. This rule would deal with the asylum problem, as well as making the country more pleasing on the eye. ie... more beautiful ladies, means more money for nightlife and tourist attractions, as the locations will be more attractive to native Brits. Thanks for the time. Calum

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
